Player History
Drafted in 22nd round, 342nd overall pick, by Kansas City in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2015, off Gary Reith (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2015, off Alphonso Anguita (BOS)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Houston on 7/29/2015...
9/23/2015: Signed a contract extension with Kansas City, $10,000,000 per year, for 1 years.
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/4/2017 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
